Articles.Content:
I know you aren't dead! I heard you were helping Snjo with his biplanes, Also, thanks for the update

Whichever comes out first, Naval guns or Planes, it's still gonna be badass!

Edited December 13, 2013 by Krosulhah
<3 this mod, cant wait till it's updated to .23 ... boats!
Digging through the code tonight, hopefully before 10pm est.

digging through the code tonight, hopefully before 10pm est.

w00t! W00t!
Sorry if this sounds a bit pushy, But will any new parts come with the update or is it just a version update?
even if it's just a compatibility update, I'm totally putting a lab on my carrier... because... It's a freakin sweet carrier!
What happend with Aircraftcarrier and do those mods work with the .23?
I'm really hoping water launch works again. Perhaps the performance improvements of 0.23 will help?

@rowns He said he's working on it

Digging through the code tonight, hopefully before 10pm est.
Ooh oke thank you.

Yes working on it guys. The code is nearly done to get things working again. I've added launch to water option tweakable in the hangar, on the con-tower and the periscope and also a time-out setting for the launch to water so it's easier to tune for slower computers. Hopefully that will help.

As I mentioned once it's up I'll let everyone know.
K guys the fix is up... go grab it on spaceport. Please post issues here, not on spaceport Not much has changed that I'm aware of, I did basic tests on everything and all SEEMS okay!
Nice!...Just grabbed it....Less than 10mins after its out...Still smells fresh baked!...

Nice!...Just grabbed it....Less than 10mins after its out...Still smells fresh baked!...

If it still smells good after 20 - 30 minutes then I'll be satisfied!

Seems like it's missing the carrier Landing Deck >_>

*fixed it just needs the career mode code data in the .cfg*

*also could we get an elevator that lifts up in the middle of the deck like the old essex class carriers?*

Edited December 21, 2013 by Hellbrand

Can you please put a mediafire download because spaceport is not working...

again...

...and again.
I have a question, cant you use R3 and R4 at the same time?, because i lose all my parts when i use them. Or did i do something wrong?
Are the source code links on spaceport up to date?
I will understand if you ignore this post and I know you get a lot of these, but will the next update have weapons? I have several projects I have been holding back on, waiting for weapons.
I have a bug. when I spawn the aircraft Carrier or the Sub, the screen is black with only the HUD showing. Thanks!

I have a bug. when I spawn the aircraft Carrier or the Sub, the screen is black with only the HUD showing. Thanks!

That bug happened earlier in update 0.21 when i used it i fixed it by launching craft not from SPH i launched it from Runway and i first launched sub or carrier then other craft after fresh game start.

And i just installed more RAM.

I will understand if you ignore this post and I know you get a lot of these, but will the next update have weapons? I have several projects I have been holding back on, waiting for weapons.

As we all of us see voting for weaponry have biggest chance of implementation because subs are added and weapons have much more votes than aircraft.

And weaponry is not fully added but it exist as trident missiles and Mini Sub mines.

That bug happened earlier in update 0.21 when i used it i fixed it by launching craft not from SPH i launched it from Runway and i first launched sub or carrier then other craft after fresh game start.

And i just installed more RAM.

I noticed FAR gives water launching some issues as well.

I noticed FAR gives water launching some issues as well.

Really? I wouldn't think FAR would be interfering with non-wing parts? Is that with just launching the ship or if you launch the ship with an aircraft pre-docked?

Any more info would be good I might be able to nail down a fix.

All that happened was that while trying to launch a large Submarine, or one of the Brazzer-class carriers, it would regularly launch them into orbit, and unresponsive, to black screen with a broken HuD. This is with no editing to the part.cfg, aside from the timing fix. (Setting time to 8 not 4)

Once I uninstalled FAR, it worked first go.

EDIT: This is also with and without the water launch part from firespitter.
